settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.colu: HRID は次で始まります
Select a file as "Active" if users should be able to create a new authority record for the file

データの保存中にエラーが発生しました。HRID は必須です。
データの保存中にエラーが発生しました。ローカル権限ファイルに対して使用できる接頭部は 1 つだけです。
データの保存中にエラーが発生しました。プレフィックスはユニークである必要があります。

settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.crea: The authority file {name} has been successfully created.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.erro: Error saving data. Prefix cannot be more than {maxlength} characters.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.upda: The authority file {name} has been successfully updated.
Changes to {name} cannot be saved. Existing authority records are already assigned to this authority file.
Changes to {name} cannot be saved because it is not the most recent version.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.dele: {name} cannot be deleted. Existing authority records are already assigned to this authority file.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.conf: {name} will be deleted.{br}Are you sure you want to delete this authority file? After deletion, new records will no longer be able to be assigned to this authority file.
settings.manageAuthoritySourceFiles.erro: Error saving data. HRID can only contain numeric values.
Error saving data. HRID cannot contain spaces.
Error saving data. HRID cannot contain more than 10 characters.
Error saving data. Prefix can only contain alphabetical values.
Error saving data. Name must be unique.
Error saving data. Base URL must be unique.
Error saving data. Base URL must contain a valid protocol.
